text:
Oprah has given the world so much: reasons to run home and turn on the TV every afternoon (oh, how we miss The Oprah Winfrey Show); excuses to tune out the world by putting on your headphones (those SuperSoul podcasts always do the trick), and examples on how to live our best lives (with, um, everything she does).

And in 2018, the O of O somehow managed to continue being the gift that keeps on giving. She graced the big screen in A Wrinkle in Time, gave the speech heard 'round the world, and helped Michelle Obama give high school girls the surprise of a lifetime. Plus, her wigs took on a life of their own, she delivered countless gems on her Instagram, and made us all green with glasses envy with every pair she rocked.

In honor of Oprah getting better, fiercer, and funnier every year, allow us to present the 10 different Oprahs she served us in 2018—the Oprahs that had the internet sharing, cackling, and reposting again and again.
title: The Best Oprah Moments of 2018

og.title: The Best Oprah Moments of 2018
og.description: From the royal wedding to her "Despacito" dance, 2019 has a lot to live up to.

meta_data.title: 10 of Oprah’s Best 2018 Moments - Oprah's Golden Globes Speech, Royal Wedding
meta_data.description: In 2018, Oprah was everywhere, thanks to a memorable Golden Globes speech, some viral dance moves, and her royal wedding appearance. Here, we round up some of the best.
meta_data.keywords: oprah's best moments, oprah moments 2018, oprah memes, oprah gifts, oprah dancing, oprah golden globes speech, oprah quotes
